Who we are

We are a global alternative asset manager with a 35-year track record. We are driven by purpose and sustainable results. We deliver outstanding investment performance to our clients, provide wide‐ranging capital solutions for corporates and owners of real assets, and create value for stakeholders, shareholders and communities.

  • Our purpose and our business
  • Our culture and values
  • Leadership and governance
  • Our history
  • Our offices and global footprint

Creating sustainable value by partnering with ambitious businesses.

At a glance

$101bn

Total assets under management (AUM)

(30 June 2024)

635

Permanent employees

(31 March 2024)

Worldwide locations

ICG’s global footprint

Operating out of 19 locations.

Over more than three decades, we have built an outstanding track record and created long‐term value for our stakeholders: helping companies thrive, institutional investors and shareholders achieve their goals, and creating an inclusive working environment where our colleagues are supported to succeed.

As we continue to grow, we maintain the same relentless focus on delivering sustainable value, knowing that our success will also be shaped by the environmental, social and governance actions we take.

Our purpose & business

Creating sustainable value by partnering with ambitious businesses

>

Our culture & values

We aim to create a culture in which our employees feel comfortable to bring their entire experience and background to work, in order to develop their talents and deliver exceptional results

Leadership & governance

ICG is committed to the highest standards of corporate governance

Corporate social responsibility

We look to support organisations that are aligned to our wider corporate objectives and areas of priority

Our history

ICG was founded in 1989 on the principles of flexible investment solutions, specialist experience and local knowledge

Our offices

Established in Europe, we have built a global alternative asset management business across sectors and geographies, which are increasingly interconnected

Company information

ICG’s registered company name, number and office address

Sustainability

We support responsible and sustainable business practices through our investments and operations

People

Our people are fundamental to every part of our success

Clients

Significant and resilient value creation for our clients

Shareholders & Debtholders

Over 30 years we’ve built an outstanding track record in creating value and growth through responsible, innovative strategies developed by our diverse global team

What we do

We provide flexible and sustainable solutions to both providers and users of capital
